user_instruction: 'Send Susan the proposal for the team retreat (susan@brighthorizonsms.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me the latest version of the team-retreat proposal? Feel free to pull any supporting details from your Gmail or our Notion workspace if that’s helpful. You can forward everything to susan@brighthorizonsms.com.

Thank you very much!

Best,  
Susan

final_output:
